title: Morgan Thorn
body: Thorn’s work has consistently been exceptional, though their insistence on secrecy and secure protocols has occasionally caused friction within the crew.  Psychological Evaluation:  Traits: Exceptional focus and obsessive dedication to their craft. Prone to mistrust and secrecy.    Notable Behaviors: Withdrawn tendencies, reclusive work habits, and sharp wit.    Challenges: Tendency to overcomplicate problems and strained relationships due to perceived secrecy. title: Contrato n22
body: Sector: X11.  Objective: Investigate the sewers and report only to me.  Reward: 22 MCr.

title: wtf are you kidding me?
body: Are you kidding me? Why don't you change your password?  The system is entirely compromised until you correct it.  You're the sysadmin, if you're this dumb the corporation is at risk.
